00010 class unknown_interface : public IUnknown {
00011 public:
00012     enum property_type_enum {
00013         void_type, bool_type, selection_type, int_type, float_type, vec3_type, rgb_type, string_type, double_type, group_begin_type, group_end_type, short_string_type, text_type, rgba_type, window_type,
00014         tab_group_begin_type, tab_group_end_type,
00015         vec2_type, vec4_type, quaternion_type, mat4_type,
00016         hbox_begin_type, vbox_begin_type, box_end_type, custom_type, progress_type, listbox_type, push_button_type,
00017         secure_string_type, secure_short_string_type,
00018         path_type, radio_button_type
00019     };
00020     explicit unknown_interface ();
00021     virtual ~unknown_interface ();
00022     virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE QueryInterface (REFIID, LPVOID *) { return E_NOINTERFACE; }
00023     virtual ULONG STDMETHODCALLTYPE AddRef ();
00024     virtual ULONG STDMETHODCALLTYPE Release ();
00025     virtual bool is_implemented () { return true; }
00026     int get_refcount () const { return ref; }
00027     int get_shade_build_number () const;
00028     volatile static unsigned interface_total_count;
00029 protected:
00030     volatile unsigned ref;
00031 };
00032 
00034 template<class T> class compointer {
00035 public:
00036     explicit compointer () : ptr(0) { }
00038     explicit compointer (T *p, int n = 0) : ptr(p) {
00039         if (ptr) while (n--) ptr->AddRef();
00040     }
00042     compointer (const compointer<T> &p) : ptr(p.ptr) {
00043         if (ptr) ptr->AddRef();
00044     }
00045     ~compointer () {
00046         if (ptr) ptr->Release();
00047     }
00049     T *get () const {
00050         return ptr;
00051     }
00053     T &operator* () const {
00054         return *ptr;
00055     }
00057     T *operator-> () const {
00058         return ptr;
00059     }
00061     operator T * () const {
00062         return ptr;
00063     }
00065     compointer<T> &operator= (T *p) {
00066         if (ptr != p && ptr != 0) ptr->Release();
00067         ptr = p;
00068         return *this;
00069     }
00071     compointer<T> &operator= (const compointer<T> &p) {
00072         if (ptr != p.get() && ptr != 0) ptr->Release();
00073         ptr = p.get();
00074         if (ptr != 0) ptr->AddRef();
00075         return *this;
00076     }
00078     T *retain () {
00079         ptr->AddRef();
00080         return ptr;
00081     }
00083     T *release () { // note that release() is NOT the reverse operation of retatin().
00084         T *p = ptr; ptr = 0; return p;
00085     }
00086 private:
00087     T *ptr;
00088 };
